objects.text:
• Classic Retro Design With Premium Build
• Advanced 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Multiple Manual Control Dials

objects.src: <svg width='300' height='100' viewBox='0 0 300 100' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><g fill='#FFFFFF'><circle cx='20' cy='50' r='10' /><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='10' /><circle cx='80' cy='50' r='10' /></g><text x='100' y='55' fill='#FFFFFF' font-family='Arial' font-size='14'>Be first to capture the moment</text></svg>

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera body with premium build quality
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Multiple manual control dials for precise shooting adjustments
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing
• Advanced autofocus system for fast and accurate focusing
• Tilting LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Film simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm looks
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• High-performance 16.3 megapixel APS-C sensor
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Durable metal construction with ergonomic grip

banner_details:
This banner features a dynamic layout with a split background — a gradient blend of deep navy on the left and a darker slate tone on the right. On the left panel, a prominent header ("heading_1") is followed by a vibrant, attention-grabbing sub-header ("heading_2") in orange, conveying an exciting promotional message. Below that, the product name is emphasized using bold typography ("subheading"), accompanied by a muted tagline ("tagline") to highlight the value proposition. Key product features are listed ("description"), followed by a brief sales note ("offer_text") and bold pricing ("price"). A vibrant call-to-action button ("cta_button") with inviting text ("cta") is placed below. The right section showcases a clear, high-quality product image ("product_image"). Decorative elements ("decorative") reinforce the visual balance and theme.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Navy: #1A2A3A
- Slate Black: #0D1921
- Accent Orange: #F26C0D
- White: #FFFFFF
- Muted Gray-Blue: #A0A9B2
product_color: The product image features a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, predominantly black with sleek design elements that emphasize professionalism and precision. The dominant color is matte black (#1A1A1A), used across the body and lens, portraying a premium and sleek feel. White (#FFFFFF) is used for text and dials, creating sharp contrast and readability. Accents like red (#FF3E3E) and orange (#FF8500) on dials and focus points highlight functionality without overpowering the overall aesthetic. The subtle lens reflections bring in hints of green (#A0C9A2) and yellow (#FFE66D), adding visual interest. For an advertisement banner, a monochrome base with contrasting white and minimal vibrant accents maintains appeal and focus.
